name: Asteroid Dust (TicosGames)
description:
Asteroid Dust is a game of destroying and dodging asteroids from your spaceship, you go through space in your spaceship flying through asteroid fields, your mission is to avoid colliding with them and destroy as many as you can.

In the different levels you will fly through different planets and enter asteroid fields of strange and very dangerous rocks.

This game is currently under development, on this page we will be reporting the latest developments.
